mapper.select: SELECT BROADCAST_SEQ, CHANNEL_NM, BROADCAST_TITLE, BROADCAST_IMAGE, BROADCAST_SUMMARY, BROADCAST_SCHEDULED_TIME FROM TB_BROADCAST WHERE BROADCAST_SEQ = #{broadcastId}
SELECT BROADCAST_SEQ, NOTICE_SEQ, NOTICE_CONTENT FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE BROADCAST_SEQ = #{broadcastId}
SELECT BROADCAST_SEQ, BENEFIT_SEQ, BENEFIT_CONTENT FROM TB_BENEFIT WHERE BROADCAST_SEQ = #{broadcastId}
SELECT BROADCAST_SEQ, FAQ_SEQ, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_ANSWER FROM TB_FAQ WHERE BROADCAST_SEQ = #{broadcastId}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_SEQ, PRODUCT_CD, PRODUCT_NM, PRODUCT_IMAGE, LIST_PRICE, DISCOUNT_RATE, DISCOUNT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, BROADCAST_SEQ FROM TB_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_STOCK S ON S.PRODUCT_SEQ = P.PRODUCT_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_BROADCAST_PRODUCT BP ON BP.PRODUCT_SEQ = P.PRODUCT_SEQ WHERE BROADCAST_SEQ = #{broadcastId}
